channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 15:35 Air alert in Zaporizhzhia region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 游댮 15:35 Air alert in Zaporizhzhia region. Stay tuned for further messages. #행햟쮐햦향혧햨햟_쮏쐃햟혜혝혧 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 游리 15:21 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community
item.description: 游리 15:21 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. item.title: 游 15:20 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for civilian evacuation - 0800339291
item.description: 游 15:20 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for civilian evacuation - 0800339291#햌혞혪햫혜햨햦햧_햟햧쮏 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
